name: Instant Pot® Apple Pie Steel Cut Oats
author: Pamela Wurtz
summary: Oatmeal made in the Instant Pot® with apples, apple pie spices, and steel-cut oats. Serve with your favorite toppings - we added pecans, a little almond milk, and a drizzle of maple syrup.
ingredients: 1  apple, or more to taste, chopped
directions: Combine water, oats, apple, cinnamon, salt, and nutmeg in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select Manual function; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes
Stir and remove pot carefully with oven mitts
